mapper.sql: class_id, class_name, grade_id, college_id, teacher_id, is_valid, create_time, update_time
mapper.select: select class_id from class where class_name=#{className}
mapper.insert: insert into class (class_id, class_name, grade_id, college_id, teacher_id, is_valid, create_time, update_time) values (#{classId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{className,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gradeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{collegeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{teacherId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isValid,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

class_id,

mapper.update:
update class
class_name = #{className,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
grade_id = #{gradeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
college_id = #{collegeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
teacher_id = #{teacherId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_valid = #{isValid,jdbcType=TINYINT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where class_id = #{classId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update class set class_name = #{className,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, grade_id = #{gradeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, college_id = #{collegeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, teacher_id = #{teacherId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_valid = #{isValid,jdbcType=TINYINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where class_id = #{classId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
